MADE IN

Portfolio

​(I just came to see the projects)

I'm Ariel Cerda, digital designer born in Viña del Mar, Chile.
I am a graphic designer with experience in web design and development. Throughout my professional career I've had to develop a wide variety of projects focused on technology, always generating excellent relationships with all kinds of people and members of different teams.
I am co-founder of 360photocl and a small community of Sketch where we teach how to use the tool.

Resume

This is what i do

I create wireframes, prototypes of low or high fidelity and design systems. I define the visual guidelines for an application based on the result of the analysis of user behavior and good practices of web usability and accessibility.

MY SKILLS

I'm always trying to improve myself in order to search the best solution for every project that I work in.

The tool doesn't make the designer but if know a wide variety tools them allows me to make better decisions when choosing.

SMART TV SOCCER APP

Estadio CDF, it's a webOS application that allows you to enjoy the contents of CDF Live and On Demand (VOD) through streaming.

Client / Canal del Fútbol

Platform / TV

Role / UI Designer

ONLINE VIDEO EDITOR FOR PUBLISHERS

FireClip it's a web application that allows you to create and edit highlights videos from live or recent programming, to be published and distributed on the web, on your own video platforms and shared out by social networks.

Client / Canal del Fútbol

Platform / TV

Agency / NED

Role / UI Designer
